doc.title: Icon Men: Rusty Joiner - Abs, Biceps, and Triceps
doc.plot: Fitness Cover Model Rusty Joiner Shares His Own Personal Workout! Complete with all American good looks and developed chiseled body, Rusty works through his personal routine and teaches you as he pushes, lifts, and curls each exercise - the very routine he uses to create his own dynamic physique. He instructs and then demonstrates exactly how each muscle group responds to his workout. Rusty teaches you his personal arm and abs workout. Rusty has a Lean, Muscular, Picture Perfect Body and 8 Pack Abs....and Now You Can Too! The DVD is about 35 minutes long, gorgeously shot on digital, and also contains bonus footage showcasing Rusty's gymnastic prowess and a private one on one interview.
